subject: Football
College Athletics
organizations: Rutgers, The State University of New Jersey
lead_paragraph: Three yards separated Rutgers from a Big East title and a berth in the Bowl Championship Series. But a failed 2-point conversion in the third overtime gave West Virginia the game.
snippet: Three yards separated Rutgers from a Big East title and a berth in the Bowl Championship Series. But a failed 2-point conversion in the third overtime gave West Virginia the game.
